thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Cotran New Material sees FY 2017 net profit up 16.6 pct to 20.3 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Cotran New Material sees FY 2017 net profit up 16.6 pct to 20.3 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - shenzhen cotran new material co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Shenzhen Cotran New Material Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 16.6 percent to 20.3 percent, or to be 63 million yuan to 65 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 54 million yuan
* Says increased income from international business is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/29oyjv
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
